name: Project Mercury
description: Make your way on foot, on a hoverbike, up skyscrapers, and down bottomless pits, as you exterminate a threat of unknown origin!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 1.8 GHz SSE2 Capable CPU Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Direct3D 9 Compatible Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 20 MB available space
